titles.title: RUSSIA Act
Reparations for Ukraine through Sovereign nation Support and Integration Act
RUSSIA Act

To direct the President to seek to obtain an agreement between the United States and other countries that have frozen the assets of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation under which parties to the agreement will use such assets to provide for the reconstruction of Ukraine upon cessation of hostilities in Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Reparations for Ukraine through Sovereign nation Support and Integration Act or the RUSSIA Act
This bill directs the President to seek to enter into an agreement with other countries that have frozen the assets of Russia's central bank to (1) transfer the frozen assets into a single account at an international financial institution, and (2) distribute such assets to provide for the reconstruction of Ukraine after the cessation of hostilities in Ukraine.
